title: 'Boys and Girl - Giants Week 9 Preview with NY Post's Paul Schwartz; NFL Network’s Kim Jones on Jamal Adams Trade Talk Fallout
itunes:title: 'Boys and Girl - Giants Week 9 Preview with NY Post's Paul Schwartz; NFL Network’s Kim Jones on Jamal Adams Trade Talk Fallout
description:
On today’s episode of The 'Boys and Girl Podcast, Jane and Bobby welcome Paul Schwartz from the New York Post to preview the Giants. Also, NFL Network’s Kim Jones stops by to discuss Jamal Adams’ reaction to nearly being shipped to Dallas and his Jets' future. Follow Jane and Bobby on Twitter and subscribe to get all the latest inside information from two of the most connected people in the Cowboys' community.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
